element.name: INVALID_DATA
element.description: The data sent is invalid. For example
Parameters out of bounds (number or enum range)

element.name: UNSUPPORTED_REQUEST
element.description: The request is not supported by Sync

element.name: OUT_OF_MEMORY
element.description: The system could not process the request because the necessary memory couldn't be allocated

element.name: TOO_MANY_PENDING_REQUESTS
element.description: There are too many requests pending (means, that the response has not been delivered, yet).
element.designdescription: There may be a maximum of 1000 pending requests at a time.

element.name: INVALID_ID
element.description: One of the provided IDs is not valid. For example
This applies to CorrelationID, SubscriptionID [@TODO if SubscriptionID is used], CommandID, MenuID, [@TODO: missed one?]

element.name: DUPLICATE_NAME
element.description: There was a conflict with an registered name (application or menu item) or vr command

element.name: TOO_MANY_APPLICATIONS
element.description: There are already too many registered applications

element.name: APPLICATION_REGISTERED_ALREADY
element.description: RegisterApplication has been called again, after a RegisterApplication was successful before.

element.name: UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
element.description: Sync doesn't support the protocol that is requested by the mobile application

element.name: WRONG_LANGUAGE
element.description: The requested language is currently not supported.
Might be because of a mismatch of the currently active language on Sync and the requested language

element.name: APPLICATION_NOT_REGISTERED
element.description: An command can not be executed because no application has been registered with RegisterApplication.

element.name: IN_USE
element.description: The data may not be changed, because it is currently in use.
For example when trying to delete a command set that is currently involved in an interaction.

element.name: SUBSCRIBED_ALREADY
element.description: The item to subscribe to is already subscribed to.

element.name: VEHICLE_DATA_NOT_ALLOWED
element.description: The user has turned off access to vehicle data, and it is globally unavailable to mobile applications.

element.name: VEHICLE_DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE
element.description: The requested vehicle data is not available on this vehicle or is not published.

element.name: REJECTED
element.description: The requested command was rejected, e.g. because mobile app is in background and cannot perform any HMI commands.
Or an HMI command (e.g. Speak) is rejected because a higher priority HMI command (e.g. Alert) is playing.

element.name: ABORTED
element.description: A command was aborted, for example due to user interaction (e.g. user pressed button).
Or an HMI command (e.g. Speak) is aborted because a higher priority HMI command (e.g. Alert) was requested.

element.name: IGNORED
element.description: A command was ignored, because the intended result is already in effect.
For example, SetMediaClockTimer was used to pause the media clock although the clock is paused already.

element.name: UNSUPPORTED_BUTTON
element.description: A button that was requested for subscription is not supported under the current system.
NOTE: could become a more generic UNSUPPORTED_RESOURCE by merging with VEHIVLE_DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE.

element.name: FILE_NOT_FOUND
element.description: A specified file could not be found on Sync.

element.name: GENERIC_ERROR
element.description: Provided data is valid but something went wrong in the lower layers.

element.name: DISALLOWED
element.description: RPC is not authorized in local policy table.

element.name: USER_DISALLOWED
element.description: RPC is included in a functional group explicitly blocked by the user.

element.name: TIMED_OUT
element.description: Overlay reached the maximum timeout and closed.

element.name: CLOSED
element.description: User chose a Close command for the overlay.

element.name: ENCRYPTED
element.description: The data is being returned through an OnEncodedSYNCPData notification.
The data is intended to be passed by the proxy to the designated server URL.

element.name: WARNINGS
element.description: The RPC (e.g. SubscribeVehicleData) executed successfully but one or more items have a warning or failure.

element.name: LONG
element.description: A button was released, after it was pressed for a long time
Actual timing is defined by Sync and may vary

element.name: SHORT
element.description: A button was released, after it was pressed for a short time
Actual timing is defined by Sync and may vary

element.name: BUTTONUP
element.description: A button has been released up

element.name: BUTTONDOWN
element.description: A button has been pressed down

enum.name: UpdateMode
enum.description: Describes how the media clock timer should behave on the platform
Starts the media clock timer counting upwards, as in time elapsed.
Starts the media clock timer counting downwards, as in time remaining.
Pauses the media clock timer
Resume the media clock timer
Clears the media clock timer (previously done through Show->mediaClock)

enum.name: TimerMode
enum.description: Causes the media clock timer to update from 0:00 to a specified time
Causes the media clock timer to update from a specified time to 0:00
Indicates to not use the media clock timer

enum.name: InteractionMode
enum.description: For application-requested interactions, this mode indicates the method in which the user is notified and uses the interaction.
This mode causes the interaction to only occur on the display, meaning the choices are provided only via the display.
Selections are made with the OK and Seek Right and Left, Tune Up and Down buttons.
This mode causes the interaction to only occur using V4.
Selections are made by saying the command.
This mode causes both a VR and display selection option for an interaction.
Selections can be made either from the menu display or by speaking the command.

enum.name: HMILevel
enum.description: Enumeraction that describes current levels of HMI.

enum.name: AudioStreamingState
enum.description: Enumeraction that describes possible states of audio streaming.

enum.name: SystemAction
enum.description: Enumeration that describes system actions that can be triggered.

element.name: DEFAULT_ACTION
element.description: Default action occurs. Standard behavior (e.g. SoftButton clears overlay).

element.name: KEEP_CONTEXT
element.description: Current system context is maintained. An overlay is persisted even though a SoftButton has been pressed and the notification sent.

enum.name: SystemContext
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible contexts an app's HMI might be in.
Communicated to whichever app is in HMI FULL, except Alert.

element.name: MAIN
element.description: The app's persistent display (whether media/non-media/navigation) is fully visible onscreen.

element.name: VRSESSION
element.description: The system is currently in a VR session (with whatever dedicated VR screen being overlaid onscreen).

element.name: MENU
element.description: The system is currently displaying a system or in-App menu onscreen.

element.name: HMI_OBSCURED
element.description: The app's display HMI is currently being obscured by either a system or other app's overlay.

element.name: ALERT
element.description: Broadcast only to whichever app has an alert currently being displayed.

enum.name: SoftButtonType
enum.description: Contains information about the SoftButton capabilities.

enum.name: AppInterfaceUnregisteredReason
enum.description: Error code, which comes from sync side.

enum.name: TriggerSource
enum.description: Indicates the source from where the command was triggered.

enum.name: HmiZoneCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the HMI zone capabilities.
For future use.

enum.name: SpeechCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the TTS capabilities.

enum.name: VrCapabilities
enum.description: Contains information about the VR capabilities.

enum.name: SamplingRate
enum.description: Describes different sampling options for PerformAudioPassThru.

enum.name: AudioCaptureQuality
enum.description: Describes different quality options for PerformAudioPassThru.

enum.name: AudioType
enum.description: Describes different audio type options for PerformAudioPassThru.

enum.name: VehicleDataType
enum.description: Defines the data types that can be published and subscribed to.

element.name: VEHICLEDATA_BATTERYPACKVOLTAGE
element.description: Battery pack voltage of hybrid and electrical vehicles

element.name: VEHICLEDATA_BATTERYCURRENT
element.description: Battery current of hybrid and electrical vehicles

element.name: VEHICLEDATA_BATTERYTEMPERATURE
element.description: Battery temperature of hybrid and electrical vehicles

enum.name: ButtonName
enum.description: Defines the hard (physical) and soft (touchscreen) buttons available from SYNC

enum.name: MediaClockFormat

element.name: CLOCK1
element.description: used for Type II and CID headunits

element.name: CLOCKTEXT1
element.description: c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters, see TypeII column in XLS. See [@TODO: create file ref]]

element.name: CLOCKTEXT2
element.description: c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters, see CID column in XLS. See [@TODO: create file ref]]
NOTE: difference between CLOCKTEXT1 and CLOCKTEXT2 is the supported character set

element.name: CLOCKTEXT3
element.description: c : character out of following character set: sp|0-9|[letters, see Type 5 column in XLS]. See [@TODO: create file ref]

enum.issue: First complete values draft. Review needed.

enum.name: DisplayType
enum.description: See DAES for further infos regarding the displays

element.name: mainField1
element.description: The first line of first set of main fields of the persistent display

element.name: mainField2
element.description: The second line of first set of main fields of the persistent display

element.name: mainField3
element.description: The first line of second set of main fields of persistent display

element.name: mainField4
element.description: The second line of second set of main fields of the persistent display

element.name: mediaTrack
element.description: The track field of NGN type ACMs.
This field is only available for media applications.

element.name: alertText1
element.description: The first line of the alert text field

element.name: alertText2
element.description: The second line of the alert text field

element.name: alertText3
element.description: The third line of the alert text field

element.name: scrollableMessageBody
element.description: Long form body of text that can include newlines and tabs.

element.name: initialInteractionText
element.description: First line suggestion for a user response (in the case of VR enabled interaction

element.name: ETA
element.description: Estimated Time of Arrival time for navigation

element.name: totalDistance
element.description: Total distance to destination for navigation

element.name: audioPassThruDisplayText1
element.description: First line of text for audio pass thru

element.name: audioPassThruDisplayText2
element.description: Second line of text for audio pass thru

enum.name: CharacterSet
enum.description: The list of potential character sets
enum.issue: Real sets have not been defined yet?

enum.name: TextAlignment
enum.description: The list of possible alignments, left, right, or centered

enum.name: TBTState
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible states of turn-by-turn client or AppLink app.

enum.name: DriverDistractionState
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible states of driver distraction.

enum.name: ImageType
enum.description: Contains information about the type of image.

param.name: value
param.description: Either the static hex icon value or the binary image file name identifier (sent by PutFile).

param.name: imageType
param.description: Describes, whether it is a static or dynamic image.

param.name: type
param.description: Describes, whether it is text, highlighted text, icon, or dynamic image. See softButtonType

param.name: text
param.description: Optional text to display (if defined as TEXT or BOTH)

param.name: image
param.description: Optional image struct for SoftButton (if defined as IMAGE or BOTH)

param.name: isHighlighted
param.description: True, if highlighted
False, if not highlighted

param.name: softButtonID
param.description: Value which is returned via OnButtonPress / OnButtonEvent

param.name: systemAction
param.description: Parameter indicating whether selecting a SoftButton shall call a specific system action. This is intended to allow Notifications to bring the callee into full / focus; or in the case of persistent overlays, the overlay can persist when a SoftButton is pressed.

struct.name: Choice
struct.description: A choice is an option given to the user, which can be selected either by menu, or through voice recognition system.

param.name: text
param.description: Text to display for VR Help item

param.name: image
param.description: Image struct for VR Help item

param.name: position
param.description: Position to display item in VR Help list

struct.name: SyncMsgVersion
struct.description: Specifies the version number of the SYNC V4 protocol, that is supported by the mobile application

param.name: majorVersion
param.description: The major version indicates versions that is not-compatible to previous versions.

param.name: minorVersion
param.description: The minor version indicates a change to a previous version that should still allow to be run on an older version (with limited functionality)

enum.name: GlobalProperty
enum.description: The different global properties.

element.name: VRHELPITEMS
element.description: The property array of vrHelp of setGlobalProperties

enum.name: CompassDirection
enum.description: The list of potential compass directions

enum.name: Dimension
enum.description: The supported dimensions of the GPS

enum.name: PRNDL
enum.description: The selected gear.

enum.name: SingleTirePressureStatus
enum.description: The pressure status of a tire.

param.name: status
param.description: See SingleTirePressureStatus.

param.name: pressure
param.description: The tire pressure in PSI.

enum.name: TirePressureTellTale
enum.description: Reflects the status of the cluster instrument warning light.

enum.name: VehicleDataResultCode
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible result codes of a vehicle data entry request.

struct.name: TireStatus
struct.description: The status and pressure of the tires.

param.name: pressureTellTale
param.description: See TirePressureTellTale.

param.name: leftFront
param.description: The status of the left front tire.

param.name: rightFront
param.description: The status of the right front tire.

param.name: leftRear
param.description: The status of the left rear tire.

param.name: rightRear
param.description: The status of the right rear tire.

param.name: innerLeftRear
param.description: The status of the inner left rear.

param.name: innerRightRear
param.description: The status of the inner right rear.

struct.name: GPSData
struct.issue: Ford to define, which values are really needed. For efficiency it might make sense to support a basic and extended data type

param.name: longitudeDegrees
param.issue: Format needs to be defined explicitely.

param.name: latitudeDegrees
param.issue: Format needs to be defined explicitely.

param.name: utcYear
param.description: The current UTC year.

param.name: utcMonth
param.description: The current UTC month.

param.name: utcDay
param.description: The current UTC day.

param.name: utcHours
param.description: The current UTC hour.

param.name: utcMinutes
param.description: The current UTC minute.

param.name: utcSeconds
param.description: The current UTC second.

param.name: compassDirection
param.description: See CompassDirection.

param.name: pdop
param.description: PDOP.

param.name: hdop
param.description: HDOP.

param.name: vdop
param.description: VDOP.

param.name: actual
param.description: True, if actual.
False, if infered.

param.name: satellites
param.description: Number of satellites in view

param.name: dimension
param.description: See Dimension

param.name: altitude
param.description: Altitude in meters

param.name: heading
param.description: The heading. North is 0

param.name: speed
param.description: The speed in KPH

param.name: dataType
param.description: Defined published data element type.

param.name: resultCode
param.description: Published data result code.

param.name: hours
param.description: The hour of the media clock.
Some radios only support a max of 19 hours. If out of range, it will be rejected.

param.name: name
param.description: The name that identifies the field. See TextFieldName.

param.name: characterSet
param.description: The character set that is supported in this field. See CharacterSet.

param.name: width
param.description: The number of characters in one row of this field.

param.name: rows
param.description: The number of rows of this field.

enum.name: PermissionStatus
enum.description: Enumeration that describes possible permission states of a policy table entry.

param.name: allowed
param.description: A set of all HMI levels that are permitted for this given RPC.

param.name: userDisallowed
param.description: A set of all HMI levels that are prohibited for this given RPC.

param.name: allowed
param.description: A set of all parameters that are permitted for this given RPC.

param.name: userDisallowed
param.description: A set of all parameters that are prohibited for this given RPC.

param.name: rpcName
param.description: Name of the individual RPC in the policy table.

struct.name: DisplayCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about the display capabilities.

param.name: displayType
param.description: The type of the display. See DisplayType

param.name: textFields
param.description: A set of all fields that support text data. See TextField

param.name: mediaClockFormats
param.description: A set of all supported formats of the media clock. See MediaClockFormat

struct.name: ButtonCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about a button's capabilities.

param.name: name
param.description: The name of the button. See ButtonName.

param.name: shortPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a short press.
Whenever the button is pressed short, onButtonPressed( SHORT) will be invoked.

param.name: longPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a LONG press.
Whenever the button is pressed long, onButtonPressed( LONG) will be invoked.

param.name: upDownAvailable
param.description: The button supports "button down" and "button up".
Whenever the button is pressed, onButtonEvent( DOWN) will be invoked.
Whenever the button is released, onButtonEvent( UP) will be invoked.

struct.name: SoftButtonCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about a SoftButton's capabilities.

param.name: shortPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a short press.
Whenever the button is pressed short, onButtonPressed( SHORT) will be invoked.

param.name: longPressAvailable
param.description: The button supports a LONG press.
Whenever the button is pressed long, onButtonPressed( LONG) will be invoked.

param.name: upDownAvailable
param.description: The button supports "button down" and "button up".
Whenever the button is pressed, onButtonEvent( DOWN) will be invoked.
Whenever the button is released, onButtonEvent( UP) will be invoked.

param.name: imageSupported
param.description: The button supports referencing a static or dynamic image.

struct.name: PresetBankCapabilities
struct.description: Contains information about on-screen preset capabilities.

param.name: onScreenPresetsAvailable
param.description: Onscreen custom presets are available.

param.name: parentID
param.description: unique ID of the sub menu, the command will be added to.
If not provided, it will be provided to the top level of the in application menu.

param.name: position
param.description: Position within the items that are are at top level of the in application menu.
0 will insert at the front.
1 will insert at the second position.
if position is greater or equal than the number of items on top level, the sub menu will be appended to the end.
If this param was omitted the entry will be added at the end.

param.name: menuName
param.description: Text to show in the menu for this sub menu.

struct.name: TTSChunk
struct.description: A TTS chunk, that consists of the text/phonemes to speak and the type (like text or SAPI)

param.name: text
param.description: The text or phonemes to speak.
May not be empty.

param.name: type
param.description: Describes, whether it is text or a specific phoneme set. See SpeechCapabilities

param.name: identifier
param.description: String containing hexadecimal identifier as well as other common names.

param.name: statusByte
param.description: Hexadecimal byte string.

param.name: make
param.description: Make of the vehicle
e.g. Ford

param.name: model
param.description: Model of the vehicle
e.g. Fiesta

param.name: modelYear
param.description: Model Year of the vehicle

param.name: trim
param.description: Trim of the vehicle
e.g. SE

enum.name: FileType
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible file types.

enum.name: AppType
enum.description: Enumeration listing possible app types.

enum.name: FunctionID
enum.description: Enumeration linking function names with function IDs in WiPro protocol.
Assumes enumeration starts at value 0.

enum.name: messageType
enum.description: Enumeration linking message types with function types in WiPro protocol.
Assumes enumeration starts at value 0.

function.name: RegisterAppInterface
function.description: Establishes an interface with a mobile application.
Before registerAppInterface no other commands will be accepted/executed.

param.name: syncMsgVersion
param.description: See SyncMsgVersion

param.name: appName
param.description: The mobile application name, e.g. "Ford Drive Green".
Needs to be unique over all applications.
May not be empty.
May not start with a new line character.
May not interfere with any name or synonym of previously registered applications and the following list of words @TODO: Create list(global commands)
Needs to be unique over all applications. Applications with the same name will be rejected.
Only characters from char set [@TODO: Create char set (character/hex value) for each ACM and refer to] are supported.

param.name: ttsName
param.description: TTS string for VR recognition of the mobile application name, e.g. "Ford Drive Green".
Meant to overcome any failing on speech engine in properly pronouncing / understanding app name.
Needs to be unique over all applications.
May not be empty.
May not start with a new line character.
May not interfere with any name or synonym of previously registered applications and the following list of words @TODO: Create list(global commands)
Needs to be unique over all applications. Applications with the same name will be rejected.
Only characters from char set [@TODO: Create char set (character/hex value) for each ACM and refer to] are supported.

param.name: ngnMediaScreenAppName
param.description: Provides an abbreviated version of the app name (if needed), that will be displayed on the NGN media screen.
If not provided, the appName is used instead (and will be truncated if too long)
Only characters from char set [@TODO: Create char set (character/hex value) for each ACM and refer to] are supported.

param.name: vrSynonyms
param.description: Defines an additional voice recognition command.
May not interfere with any name or synonym of previously registered applications and the following list of words @TODO: Create list(global commands)
Only characters from char set [@TODO: Create char set (character/hex value) for each ACM and refer to] are supported.

param.name: isMediaApplication
param.description: Indicates if the application is a media or a non-media application.
Only media applications will be able to stream audio to Sync that is audible outside of the BT media source.

param.name: languageDesired
param.description: See Language
Current apps expected VR+TTS language
If there is a mismatch with SYNC, the app will be able to change this registration with changeRegistration prior to app being brought into focus.

param.name: hmiDisplayLanguageDesired
param.description: See Language
Current apps expected display language
If there is a mismatch with SYNC, the app will be able to change this registration with changeRegistration prior to app being brought into focus.

param.name: appType
param.description: See AppType
List of all applicable app types stating which classifications to be given to the app.
e.g. for platforms like GEN2, this will determine which "corner(s)" the app can populate.

param.name: appID
param.description: ID used to validate app with policy table entries

function.name: RegisterAppInterface
function.description: The response to registerAppInterface

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: syncMsgVersion
param.description: See SyncMsgVersion

param.name: language
param.description: The currently active VR+TTS language on Sync. See "Language" for options.

param.name: hmiDisplayLanguage
param.description: The currently active display language on Sync. See "Language" for options.

param.name: displayCapabilities
param.description: See DisplayCapabilities

param.name: buttonCapabilities
param.description: See ButtonCapabilities

param.name: softButtonCapabilities
param.description: If returned, the platform supports on-screen SoftButtons.
See SoftButtonCapabilities

param.name: presetBankCapabilities
param.description: If returned, the platform supports custom on-screen Presets.
See PresetBankCapabilities

param.name: hmiZoneCapabilities
param.description: See HmiZoneCapabilities

param.name: speechCapabilities
param.description: See SpeechCapabilities

param.name: vrCapabilities
param.description: See VrCapabilities

param.name: vehicleType
param.description: Specifies the vehicle's type. See VehicleType.

function.name: UnregisterAppInterface
function.description: Closes an interface from a mobile application.
After unregisterAppInterface, no commands other than registerAppInterface will be accepted/executed.
Will fail, if no registerAppInterface was completed successfully before.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: SetGlobalProperties
function.description: Allows setting global properties.

param.name: helpPrompt
param.description: The help prompt.
An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: timeoutPrompt
param.description: Help text for a wait timeout.
An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: vrHelpTitle
param.description: VR Help Title text.
If omitted on supported displays, the default SYNC help title shall be used.

param.name: vrHelp
param.description: VR Help Items.
If omitted on supported displays, the default SYNC generated help items shall be used.
If the list of VR Help Items contains nonsequential positions (e.g. [1,2,4]), the RPC shall be rejected.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: ResetGlobalProperties
function.description: Allows resetting global properties.

param.name: properties
param.description: Contains the names of all global properties (like timeoutPrompt) that should be unset. Resetting means, that they have the same value as at start up (default)

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: AddCommand
function.description: Adds a command to the in application menu.
Either menuParams or vrCommands must be provided.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: unique ID of the command to add.

param.name: menuParams
param.description: Optional sub value containing menu parameters

param.name: vrCommands
param.description: An array of strings to be used as VR synonyms for this command.
If this array is provided, it may not be empty.

param.name: cmdIcon
param.description: Image struct determining whether static or dynamic icon.
If omitted on supported displays, no (or the default if applicable) icon shall be displayed.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: DeleteCommand
function.description: Deletes all commands from the in-application menu with the specified command id.

param.name: cmdID
param.description: ID of the command(s) to delete.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: AddSubMenu
function.description: Adds a sub menu to the in-application menu.

param.name: menuID
param.description: unique ID of the sub menu to add.

param.name: position
param.description: Position within the items that are are at top level of the in application menu.
0 will insert at the front.
1 will insert at the second position.
If position is greater or equal than the number of items on top level, the sub menu will be appended to the end.
Position of any submenu will always be located before the return and exit options
If this param was omitted the entry will be added at the end.

param.name: menuName
param.description: Text to show in the menu for this sub menu.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: DeleteSubMenu
function.description: Deletes a submenu from the in-application menu.

param.name: menuID
param.description: The "menuID" of the submenu to delete. (See addSubMenu.menuID)

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: CreateInteractionChoiceSet
function.description: creates interaction choice set to be used later by performInteraction

param.name: interactionChoiceSetID
param.description: Unique ID used for this interaction choice set.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: PerformInteraction
function.description: Triggers an interaction (e.g. "Permit GPS?" - Yes, no, Always Allow).

param.name: initialText
param.description: Text to be displayed first.

param.name: initialPrompt
param.description: This is the intial prompt spoken to the user at the start of an interaction
An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: interactionMode
param.description: See InteractionMode.

param.name: interactionChoiceSetIDList
param.description: List of interaction choice set IDs to use with an interaction.

param.name: helpPrompt
param.description: Help text. This is the spoken string when a user speaks "help" when the interaction is occuring.
An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: timeoutPrompt
param.description: Timeout text. This text is spoken when a VR interaction times out.
An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: timeout
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds.
If omitted a standard value of 10000 milliseconds is used.

param.name: vrHelp
param.description: Ability to send suggested VR Help Items to display on-screen during Perform Interaction.
If omitted on supported displays, the default SYNC generated list of suggested choices shall be displayed.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: choiceID
param.description: ID of the choice that was selected in response to PerformInteraction.

param.name: triggerSource
param.description: See TriggerSource

function.name: DeleteInteractionChoiceSet
function.description: Deletes interaction choice set that has been created with "CreateInteractionChoiceSet".
The interaction may only be deleted when not currently in use by a "performInteraction".

param.name: interactionChoiceSetID
param.description: ID of the interaction choice set to delete.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: Alert
function.description: Shows an alert which typically consists of text-to-speech message and text on the display. At least either alertText1, alertText2 or TTSChunks need to be provided.

param.name: alertText1
param.description: The first line of the alert text field

param.name: alertText2
param.description: The second line of the alert text field

param.name: alertText3
param.description: The optional third line of the alert text field

param.name: ttsChunks
param.description: An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: duration
param.description: Timeout in milliseconds.
Typical timeouts are 3-5 seconds
If omitted, timeout is set to 5s.

param.name: playTone
param.description: Defines if tone should be played. Tone is played before TTS.
If omitted, no tone is played.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted on supported displays, the displayed alert shall not have any SoftButtons.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: tryAgainTime
param.description: Amount of time (in seconds) that an app must wait before resending an alert.
If provided, another system event or overlay currently has a higher priority than this alert.
An app must not send an alert without waiting at least the amount of time dictated.

function.name: Show
function.description: Updates the persistent display. Supported fields depend on display capabilities.

param.name: mainField1
param.description: The text that should be displayed in a single or upper display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField1 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: mainField2
param.description: The text that should be displayed on the second display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField2 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: mainField3
param.description: The text that should be displayed on the second "page" first display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField3 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: mainField4
param.description: The text that should be displayed on the second "page" second display line.
If this text is not set, the text of mainField4 stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: alignment
param.description: Specifies how mainField1 and mainField2 texts should be aligned on display.
If omitted, texts will be centered

param.name: statusBar
param.description: Requires investigation regarding the nav display capabilities. Potentially lower lowerStatusBar, upperStatusBar, titleBar, etc.

param.name: mediaClock
param.description: Text value for MediaClock field. Has to be properly formatted by Mobile App according to Sync capabilities.
If this text is set, any automatic media clock updates previously set with SetMediaClockTimer will be stopped.
param.issue: To be deprecated (Clearing should be done in SetMediaClockTimer)

param.name: mediaTrack
param.description: The text that should be displayed in the track field.
This field is only valid for media applications on NGN type ACMs.
If this text is not set, the text of mediaTrack stays unchanged.
If this text is empty "", the field will be cleared.

param.name: graphic
param.description: Image struct determining whether static or dynamic image to display in app.
If omitted on supported displays, the displayed graphic shall not change.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted on supported displays, the currently displayed SoftButton values will not change.

param.name: customPresets
param.description: App labeled on-screen presets (i.e. GEN2).
If omitted on supported displays, the presets will be shown as not defined.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: Speak
function.description: Speaks a text.

param.name: ttsChunks
param.description: An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: SetMediaClockTimer
function.description: Sets the initial media clock value and automatic update method.

param.name: startTime
param.description: See StartTime
startTime must be provided for "COUNTUP" and "COUNTDOWN"
startTime will be ignored for "PAUSE", "RESUME", and "CLEAR"

param.name: updateMode
param.description: Enumeration to control the media clock.
In case of pause, resume, or clear, the start time value is ignored and shall be left out. For resume, the time continues with the same value as it was when paused.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: EncodedSyncPData
function.description: Allows encoded data in the form of SyncP packets to be sent to the SYNC module

param.name: data
param.description: Contains base64 encoded string of SyncP packets.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: DialNumber
function.description: Dials a phone number and switches to phone application.

param.name: number
param.issue: Should it really be a simple string?
param.description: Phone number is a string consisting of only the digits and "+", which can be up to 40 chars.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: PerformAudioPassThru
function.description: Starts audio pass thru session

param.name: initialPrompt
param.description: SYNC will speak this prompt before opening the audio pass thru session
An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk
The array must have at least one item

param.name: audioPassThruDisplayText1
param.description: First line of text displayed during audio capture.

param.name: audioPassThruDisplayText2
param.description: Second line of text displayed during audio capture.

param.name: samplingRate
param.description: This value shall be allowed at 8 khz or 16 or 22 or 44 khz.

param.name: maxDuration
param.description: The maximum duration of audio recording in milliseconds.

param.name: bitsPerSample
param.description: Specifies the quality the audio is recorded. Currently 8 bit or 16 bit.

param.name: audioType
param.description: Specifies the type of audio data being requested.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: EndAudioPassThru
function.description: When this request is invoked, the audio capture stops.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: SubscribeButton
function.description: Subscribes to built-in HMI buttons.
The application will be notified by the OnButtonEvent and OnButtonPress.
To unsubscribe the notifications, use unsubscribeButton.

param.name: buttonName
param.description: Name of the button to subscribe.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: UnsubscribeButton
function.description: Unsubscribes from built-in HMI buttons.

param.name: buttonName
param.description: Name of the button to unsubscribe.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: SubscribeVehicleData
function.description: Subscribes for specific published data items.
The data will be only sent if it has changed.
The application will be notified by the onVehicleData notification whenever new data is available.
To unsubscribe the notifications, use unsubscribe with the same subscriptionType.

param.name: dataType
param.description: List of defined vehicle data elements.
See VehicleDataType

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: dataResult
param.description: Permission status of vehicle data element.

function.name: UnsubscribeVehicleData
function.description: This function is used to unsubscribe the notifications from the subscribeVehicleData function.

param.name: dataType
param.description: Refers to the vehicle data elements specified by subscribeVehicleData.
See VehicleDataType

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: dataResult
param.description: Permission status of vehicle data element.

function.name: GetVehicleData
function.description: Non periodic vehicle data read request.

param.name: dataType
param.description: Complex signals like "GPS" should not be transferred as separate notifications, but all together in one notification.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: gps
param.description: See GPSData
Subscribable

param.name: speed
param.description: The vehicle speed in kilometers per hour
Subscribable

param.name: rpm
param.description: The number of revolutions per minute of the engine
Subscribable

param.name: fuelLevel
param.description: The fuel level

param.name: avgFuelEconomy
param.description: The average fuel economy in litres/100km

param.name: batteryVoltage
param.description: The voltage in Volts

param.name: externalTemperature
param.description: The external temperature in degrees celsius.

param.name: vin
param.description: Vehicle identification number.

param.name: prndl
param.description: See PRNDL.
Subscribable
param.issue: Is this a good name? Wouldn't be selectedGear better?

param.name: tirePressure
param.description: See TireStatus.
Subscribable

param.name: batteryPackVoltage
param.description: Battery pack voltage of hybrid and electrical vehicles in volts

param.name: batteryPackCurrent
param.description: Battery current of hybrid and electrical vehicles in amperes

param.name: batteryPackTemperature
param.description: Battery temperature of hybrid and electrical vehicles in degrees celsius

param.name: engineTorque
param.description: Engine torque in Nm
Subscribable

param.name: odometer
param.description: Odometer in km

param.name: tripOdometer
param.description: Odometer of trip in km
param.issue: This mixes up "Trip A" and "Total distance during this trip". Shall we seperate these two instead

param.name: satRadioESN
param.description: The hexadecimal ESN of the satellite radio (if supported).

function.name: ReadDID
function.description: Non periodic vehicle data read request.

param.name: ecuName
param.description: Name of ECU.

param.name: didLocation
param.description: Get raw data from vehicle data DID location(s).

param.name: encrypted
param.description: If not provided, the default is equal to False"
Indicates if the DID data requested should be returned as encrypted through an OnEncodedSYNCPData response.
If set to true, the data will return instead through OnEncodedSYNCPData and be passed through the proxy to the designated server URL.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: dataResult
param.description: Permission status of data element.

param.name: data
param.description: Raw DID-based data returned for requested element.

function.name: GetDTCs
function.description: Vehicle module diagnostic trouble code request.

param.name: ecuName
param.description: Name of ECU.

param.name: encrypted
param.description: If not provided, the default is equal to False"
Indicates if the DTC data requested should be returned as encrypted through an OnEncodedSYNCPData response.
If set to true, the data will return instead through OnEncodedSYNCPData and be passed through the proxy to the designated server URL.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: dtcList
param.description: Array of all reported DTCs on module.

function.name: ScrollableMessage
function.description: Creates a full screen overlay containing a large block of formatted text that can be scrolled with up to 8 SoftButtons defined

param.name: scrollableMessageBody
param.description: Body of text that can include newlines and tabs.

param.name: timeout
param.description: App defined timeout.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: App defined SoftButtons.
If omitted on supported displays, only the system defined "Close" SoftButton will be displayed.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

function.name: Slider
function.description: Creates a full screen or pop-up overlay (depending on platform) with a single user controlled slider.

param.name: numTicks
param.description: Number of selectable items on a horizontal axis

param.name: position
param.description: Initial position of slider control (cannot exceed numTicks)

param.name: sliderHeader
param.description: Text header to display

param.name: sliderFooter
param.description: Text footer to display (meant to display min/max threshold descriptors).
For a static text footer, only one footer string shall be provided in the array.
For a dynamic text footer, the number of footer text string in the array must match the numTicks value.
For a dynamic text footer, text array string should correlate with potential slider position index.
If omitted on supported displays, no footer text shall be displayed.

param.name: timeout
param.description: App defined timeout.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: sliderPosition
param.description: Current slider value returned when saved or canceled

param.name: distanceToManeuver
param.description: Distance till next maneuver (starting from) from previous maneuver.
Used to calculate progress bar.

param.name: distanceToManeuverScale
param.description: Fraction of distance till next maneuver (starting from when AlertManeuver is triggered).
Used to calculate progress bar.

param.name: maneuverComplete
param.description: If and when a maneuver has completed while an AlertManeuver is active, the app must send this value set to TRUE in order to clear the AlertManeuver overlay.
If omitted the value will be assumed as FALSE.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: Three dynamic SoftButtons available (second SoftButton is fixed to "Turns").
If omitted on supported displays, the currently displayed SoftButton values will not change.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: ttsChunks
param.description: An array of text chunks of type TTSChunk. See TTSChunk

param.name: softButtons
param.description: If omitted on supported displays, only the system defined "Close" SoftButton shall be displayed.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: softButtons
param.description: If omitted on supported displays, app-defined SoftButton will be left blank.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: language
param.description: Requested SYNC voice engine (VR+TTS) language registration

param.name: hmiDisplayLanguage
param.description: Request display language registration

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: GenericResponse
function.description: Generic Response is sent, when the name of a received msg cannot be retrieved. Only used in case of an error.
Currently, only resultCode INVALID_DATA is used.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: PutFile
function.description: Used to push a binary data onto the SYNC module from a mobile device, such as icons and album art
Not supported on first generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: syncFileName
param.description: File reference name.

param.name: fileType
param.description: Selected file type.

param.name: persistentFile
param.description: Indicates if the file is meant to persist between sessions / ignition cycles.
If set to TRUE, then the system will aim to persist this file through session / cycles.
While files with this designation will have priority over others, they are subject to deletion by the system at any time.
In the event of automatic deletion by the system, the app will receive a rejection and have to resend the file.
If omitted, the value will be set to false.

param.name: fileData
param.description: Binary data.

function.name: PutFile
function.description: Response is sent, when the file data was copied (success case). Or when an error occured.
Not supported on First generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: spaceAvailable
param.description: Provides the total local space available on SYNC for the registered app.

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: DeleteFile
function.description: Used to delete a file resident on the SYNC module in the app's local cache.
Not supported on first generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: syncFileName
param.description: File reference name.

function.name: DeleteFile
function.description: Response is sent, when the file data was deleted (success case). Or when an error occured.
Not supported on First generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: spaceAvailable
param.description: Provides the total local space available on SYNC for the registered app.

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: ListFiles
function.description: Requests the current list of resident filenames for the registered app
Not supported on first generation SYNC vehicles.

function.name: ListFiles
function.description: Returns the current list of resident filenames for the registered app along with the current space available
Not supported on First generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: filenames
param.description: An array of all filenames resident on SYNC for the given registered app.
If omitted, then no files currently reside on the system.

param.name: spaceAvailable
param.description: Provides the total local space available on SYNC for the registered app.

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: SetAppIcon
function.description: Used to set existing local file on SYNC as the app's icon
Not supported on first generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: syncFileName
param.description: File reference name.

function.name: SetAppIcon
function.description: Response is sent, when the file data was copied (success case). Or when an error occured.
Not supported on First generation SYNC vehicles.
Response is sent, when the file data was copied (success case). Or when an error occured.
Not supported on First generation SYNC vehicles.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

function.name: SetDisplayLayout
function.description: Used to set an alternate display layout.
If not sent, default screen for given platform will be shown.

param.name: displayLayout
param.description: Predefined or dynamically created screen layout.
Currently only predefined screen layouts are defined.
Predefined layouts include:
"ONSCREEN_PRESETS"
Custom screen containing app-defined onscreen presets. Currently defined for GEN2.

param.name: success
param.description: true, if successful
false, if failed

param.name: resultCode
param.description: See Result

param.name: info
param.description: Provides additional human readable info regarding the result.

param.name: hmiLevel
param.description: See HMILevel

param.name: audioStreamingState
param.description: See AudioStreamingState

param.name: systemContext
param.description: See SystemContext

param.name: reason
param.description: See AppInterfaceUnregisteredReason

function.name: OnButtonEvent
function.description: Notifies application of UP/DOWN events for buttons to which the application is subscribed.

param.name: buttonEventMode
param.description: Indicates whether this is an UP or DOWN event.

param.name: customButtonID
param.description: If ButtonName is CUSTOM_BUTTON", this references the integer ID passed by a custom button. (e.g. softButton ID)

function.name: OnButtonPress
function.description: Notifies application of LONG/SHORT press events for buttons to which the application is subscribed.

param.name: buttonPressMode
param.description: Indicates whether this is a LONG or SHORT button press event.

param.name: customButtonID
param.description: If ButtonName is CUSTOM_BUTTON", this references the integer ID passed by a custom button. (e.g. softButton ID)

function.name: OnVehicleData
function.description: Callback for the periodic and non periodic vehicle data read function.

param.name: gps
param.description: See GPSData
Subscribable

param.name: speed
param.description: The vehicle speed in kilometers per hour
Subscribable

param.name: rpm
param.description: The number of revolutions per minute of the engine
Subscribable

param.name: fuelLevel
param.description: The fuel level

param.name: avgFuelEconomy
param.description: The average fuel economy in litres/100km

param.name: batteryVoltage
param.description: The voltage in Volts

param.name: externalTemperature
param.description: The external temperature in degrees celsius.

param.name: vin
param.description: Vehicle identification number.

param.name: prndl
param.description: See PRNDL.
Subscribable
param.issue: Is this a good name? Wouldn't be selectedGear better?

param.name: tirePressure
param.description: See TireStatus.
Subscribable

param.name: batteryPackVoltage
param.description: Battery pack voltage of hybrid and electrical vehicles in volts

param.name: batteryPackCurrent
param.description: Battery current of hybrid and electrical vehicles in amperes

param.name: batteryPackTemperature
param.description: Battery temperature of hybrid and electrical vehicles in degrees celsius

param.name: engineTorque
param.description: Engine torque in Nm
Subscribable

param.name: odometer
param.description: Odometer in km

param.name: tripOdometer
param.description: Odometer of trip in km
param.issue: This mixes up "Trip A" and "Total distance during this trip". Shall we seperate these two instead

param.name: genericbinary
param.description: The hex value string is a string of hexadecimal chars, for example "FE12" or "1234ABCD".

param.name: cmdID
param.description: Command ID, which is related to a specific menu entry.

param.name: triggerSource
param.description: See TriggerSource

function.name: OnEncodedSyncPData
function.description: Callback including encoded data of any SyncP packets that SYNC needs to send back to the mobile device.

param.name: data
param.description: Contains base64 encoded string of SyncP packets.

param.name: URL
param.description: If blank, the SyncP data shall be forwarded to the app.
If not blank, the SyncP data shall be forwarded to the provided URL.

param.name: Timeout
param.description: If blank, the SyncP data shall be forwarded to the app.
If not blank, the SyncP data shall be forwarded with the provided timeout in seconds.

function.name: OnTBTClientState
function.description: Provides applications with notifications specific to the current TBT client status on the module

param.name: state
param.description: Current State of TBT client

function.name: OnDriverDistraction
function.description: Provides driver distraction state to mobile applications

param.name: state
param.description: Current State of Driver Distraction

function.name: OnPermissionsChange
function.description: Provides update to app of which policy-table-enabled functions are available

param.name: permissionItem
param.description: Change in permissions for a given set of RPCs.

param.name: language
param.description: Current SYNC voice engine (VR+TTS) language

param.name: hmiDisplayLanguage
param.description: Current display language

struct.name: HMIApplication
struct.description: Data type containing information about application needed by HMI.

enum.name: DeactivateReason
enum.description: Enum of reasons of user navigating from application used by HMI.

element.name: GENERAL
element.description: Other screens navigation apart from other mobile app.
